# CapturedRoom.Surface.Edge.top

**Case**

An edge that identifies the top of a surface.

## Declaration

```swift
case top
```

## Accessing edge types

- **CapturedRoom.Surface.Edge.bottom**: An edge that identifies the bottom of a surface.
- **CapturedRoom.Surface.Edge.left**: An edge that identifies the left side of a surface.
- **CapturedRoom.Surface.Edge.right**: An edge that identifies the right side of a surface.
